original_title: John Henry Balch:  Congressional Medal of Honor
overview: The life of WWI U.S. Navy Pharmacist Mate and Congressional Medal of Honor recipient, John Henry Balch, with a focus on his assignment to the 3rd Battalion, 6th Marine Regiment, during the infamous Battle of Belleau Wood.
tagline: During a time to kill, he chose to heal.
title: John Henry Balch:  Congressional Medal of Honor
